name: fix-skill-validation-warnings
description: Automated approach to fix CI validation errors and warnings across skill plugins. Use when: (1) CI reports validation failures in SKILL.md files, (2) Bulk fixing missing Overview/Verified Workflow/Results sections, (3) Converting Failed Attempts prose to required table format. Verified on ProjectMnemosyne with 198 plugins.
author: ProjectMnemosyne
use_cases: Fix CI validation failures after bulk skill imports
Add missing required sections (Overview, Verified Workflow, Results)
Convert Failed Attempts prose/subsections to table format
Batch update plugin.json name fields to kebab-case
